metadata.synopsis: The emperor reacts to a brainquake in the wake of killing Orin. Different nodes depending on whether Gortash is alive or dead.

0.speaker: GROUP_Emperors
0.text: We're ready to confront the brain. Expect it to do everything it can to stop us.

1.speaker: GROUP_Emperors
1.text: At this point, nobody can control the brain. And it knows it. We must seize the third stone before it breaks free!
